resources.string: Adds menu item to favourites list.

To use the Search activity you must enter search terms in the text field provided. Submitting the search terms will produce a list of recipes that match the search terms. Once a list is produced you can click on an item in the list to view details of that list item. Clicking on the bookmark or favourite button will prompt whether you want to add that item to favourites or not. Use the nav drawer to navigate to other activities

To use the favourites activity you can click on a favourited item to view the details. Clicking on the bookmark button will prompt for confirmation that you want to delete an item from favourites. Use the navigation drawer to navigate to other activities.
Do you want to remove this recipe from your favourites?
Recipe has been added to favourites

This page loads popular recipes , you may refresh to see more as well as click the bookmark icon on the right to both favourite and unfavourite recipes. You may click the recipe to see the details as well.
